MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L32 postcode area of Kirkby, affecting properties in Park Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.29am. Our engineers are on the way to site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.56am on 30th of Jan 2021
